definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Second, the effectiveness and return of serve a high level of volleyball in the world there is a considerable gap.
sentences.chinese: 其次接发球效果和世界高水平男排存在着很大的差距。

sentences.english: Whether the service reception is good has direct effect on the outcome of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 接发球水平的高低直接影响到比赛的胜负。

sentences.english: Q. How good was he returning serve today?
sentences.chinese: 对手今天的接发球表现如何？

sentences.english: The elite players' standing position when receiving the 40mm ball after service is main on the side of the left half table.
sentences.chinese: 改大球后优秀运动员接发球站位仍以左半台站位为主。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered the tennis champion's return of service.
sentences.chinese: 观众对这位网球冠军的接发球报之以欢呼。

sentences.english: Service reception is one of the most important taches and forms in a table tennis match.
sentences.chinese: 接发球是乒乓球比赛中的重要环节和组成部分。

sentences.english: His return of serve is considered one of the best ever.
sentences.chinese: 他的发球强，接发球更被认为是史上最佳之一。

sentences.english: The receiving player commits a technical fault penalized by the referee.
sentences.chinese: 接发球运动员违例而被裁判鸣哨。

sentences.english: Smith has had two breaks already in this set.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在这场比赛中有两次接发球得分。

sentences.english: Once again, that is, the return of serve tactical system attacking the gap.
sentences.chinese: 再次，就是接发球战术系统进攻的差距。
